mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ua.application_id AS application_id, app.code AS app_code, a.permission AS permission FROM gar_users u, gar_applications app, gar_user_application ua, gar_user_department ud, gar_role_department rd, gar_role_permission rp, gar_permissions p, gar_resources m, gar_resource_api mp, gar_apis a WHERE m.status = 1 AND a.status = 1 AND ua.user_id = u.user_id AND app.application_id = ua.application_id AND ud.user_id = u.user_id AND rd.department_id = ud.department_id AND rp.role_id = rd.role_id AND p.permission_id = rp.permission_id AND m.application_id = p.application_id AND m.path LIKE p.wildcard AND mp.resource_id = m.resource_id AND mp.api_id = a.api_id
